ModMetaData.name: Hot Chocolate
ModMetaData.description:
Turn the chocolate you harvest from your cocoa trees into something even better. In addition to applying a mood buff on consumption, hot chocolate fills more recreation and hunger than consuming regular chocolate.

-Adds a hot chocolate recipe to the game.
-Recipe is usable at the campfire, electric stove, and fueled stove.
-Unlocked after researching Cocoa.
-Usable by all technology levels.
ModMetaData.author: Will
